name: World of Guns:Texture Pack 2
detailed_description:
This DLC unlocks package of the textures for PAINT mode.
Current pack includes textures:
- patterns: wood, carbon, rust, scratches
- stickers: skulls, flames, flags, special stamps
In the PAINT mode user may change textures of the models, add stickers and patterns.
For each model user may have 3 slots of the paints, this DLC unlocks 3 additional slots for each model. But overall can be maximum 6 slots

short_description: This DLC unlocks package of the textures for PAINT mode. In the PAINT mode user may change textures of the models, add stickers and patterns. For each model user may have 3 slots of the paints, this DLC unlocks 3 additional slots for each model.
supported_languages: English, Russian, Italian, German, French, Spanish - Spain, Ukrainian, Polish, Traditional Chinese, Czech, Portuguese - Brazil, Dutch, Swedish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimale :
  • Système d'exploitation : XP and higher
  • Mémoire vive : 1024 MB de mémoire
  • Réseau : Connexion internet haut débit
  • Espace disque : 400 MB d'espace disque disponible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommandée :
  • Système d'exploitation : XP and higher
  • Mémoire vive : 2048 MB de mémoire
  • Réseau : Connexion internet haut débit
  • Espace disque : 400 MB d'espace disque disponible
